item.title: CRUD-Sourcing is why Your Event Streams Are Bloated
item.description: I see the same two issues come up over and over with event sourcing — they cause a lot of pain and they shouldn’t have to. Most of the pain stems from bad modeling, specifically because of CRUD-Sourcing.
